name: Get Out Of Hell ! (Wolves And Fairies)
name_original: Get Out Of Hell ! (Wolves And Fairies)
description:
Story

In this clicker game, you, the devil's son, battles against you Dad's army to Get Out Of Hell and retrieve your love outside! Empower yourself after each defeated enemy and be strong enough to escape this situation.

Controls & Features

- Click on attack button to make your character hit enemies.

- Buy items to get stronger using orbs and hearts to make your character stronger. Hold click or use scroll mouse to scroll items.

- Gain XP for each defeated ennemy and upgrade your stats each level

Dev Message

* This is an early prototype of the game. I need you to get feedbacks to improve it and make it a better game. 

Join the Discord server or follow the Twitter for game news.

Thanks.
